actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to require the President to give notice of the intention of the United States to withdraw from the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty, and for other purposes.
short_title: Strategic Anti-Missile Revitalization and Security Act of 1996

summary.text: Strategic Anti-Missile Revitalization and Security Act of 1996 - Directs the President to give notice to the Russian Federation of the U.S. intention to withdraw from the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty, as permitted under Treaty articles. Prohibits, after a specified time, the expenditure of funds for the enforcement of such Treaty. Directs the President, after notification to the Russian Federation, to certify to the Congress that the Treaty is no longer interpreted as applying to the development or operation of any U.S. missile defense or air defense systems.

titles.title: Strategic Anti-Missile Revitalization and Security Act of 1996
A bill to require the President to give notice of the intention of the United States to withdraw from the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty, and for other purposes.
